title: Side by side: prejudice
brief_description: Friction occurs between two girlfriends - one white, the other Chinese - when the white girl’s boyfriend does not invite the chinese girl to the exclusive Country Club because of her nationality. Raises issues surrounding the values of frienship, and irrational prejudices. No other credits available.
